ithin koheda palath sabhawalata idam balathala.ee pilibandawa dahathunwana aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanaye 25 wana pituwe 1 yatathe nithiya ha yatha pawathma yatathe wimadhyagatha karanu labana wishaya yataෙth, palatha athulatha mahajana samaya ha polis balathala kriyathmaka kirima sambandhayen palatha awadhanayen sitiyath, eeta athulath nowana jathika aarakshawa, jathika surakshithathawaya saha yam sannaddha hamuda ho siwil balathalawalata sahaya pinisa shri lanka aanduwe palanaya yatathe athi ෙwanath yam hamuda yoda ganima athulath nowiya yuthu karanayi.
